greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating row sums of the Sheffer triangle (exp(x), exp(3*x) - 1) given in A282629.
comment: See A282629 for details. This is a generalization of A000587.
formula: a(n) = (1/e)*Sum_{m>=0} ((-1)^m / m!)*(1 + 3*m)^n, n >= 0, (Dobiński type formula).- _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 10 2017
mathematica: Fold[#2 - #1 &, Reverse@ #] & /@ Table[Sum[Binomial[m, k] (-1)^(k - m) (1 + 3 k)^n/m!, {k, 0, m}], {n, 0, 19}, {m, 0, n}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Apr 08 2017 *)
program: (PARI) T(n, m) = sum(k=0, m, binomial(m, k) * (-1)^(k - m) * (1 + 3*k)^n/m!);
a(n) = sum(m=0, n, (-1)^m*T(n, m)); \\ _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 10 2017
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 05 2017
